channel.description: Week 7 Announcements This Week Mon: Lab 6 Due 7 PM Mon: Week 6 Discussion 11:59 PM Friday: Week 7 Quizzes Friday: Final Project Proposal Next Mon: Lab 7 Next Mon: Week 7 Discussion Lab 6 Grading Windows File Server Ubuntu File Server Windows Web Application Cloud Web Application Lab 7 Backup & Restore Monitoring DevOps Speaker: Hunter Guthrie Plant System Administrator Evergy - Wolf Creek Former CIS 527 Student Highly Secure Industry Final Project Build Something or Fix Something Web Resource for New Startup Set up Laptops for a School Design Central Auth for Company Thin Clients vs. Thick in Labs Chat with me for ideas Final Project Completion Written Report - Use Template Research, Propose & SWOT Analysis Include Graphics & Data As Needed Live Presentation - 15-30 minutes Convince Me You've Analyzed It Well Small Prototype - Should be Easy Spend 2-4 Hours on Prototype Presentation Live or Pre-recorded Present on or before Friday Schedule Now! Email for Alt. Arrangements Keep in Touch! Discussions on Discord "Tea Time" Office Hours Tuesday 3:30 | Friday 10:30 One-on-One Office Hours
